original_title: Rainy conditions expected to continue in parts of the island
original_body_lines: Rainy conditions are expected to continue in the Northern, Eastern, Uva, Central and Southern provinces today, and cloudy skies can be expected over most parts of the island, the Meteorology Department said.
Showers will occur at times in Northern, Eastern, Uva, Central, Southern and North-central provinces. Heavy rainfall above 100 mm can be expected at some places.
Showers are likely in the other areas of the island during the morning. Showers or thundershowers will occur at several places in these areas after 1.00 p.m.
The public is kindly requested to take adequate precautions to minimize damages caused by temporary localized strong winds and lightning during thundershowers.
